G

GameController - Class in com.example.mydmsproject.controller
A controller class for handling key/mouse event, checking impacts and updating states of all objects in game scene.
GameController(Scenes) - Constructor for class com.example.mydmsproject.controller.GameController
Default class constructor, initialize a timeline for updating all objects in game scene, refresh periodically.
GameRenderer - Class in com.example.mydmsproject.view
The view class for rendering all objects in game scene.
GameRenderer(Scenes, GraphicsContext) - Constructor for class com.example.mydmsproject.view.GameRenderer
Default class constructor, initialize a timeline for rendering all objects in game scene, refresh periodically.
